snippet: A federal judge in Austin denied an emergency injunction on behalf of immigrant families who were denied birth certificates for United States-born children.
abstract: Texas Judge Robert Pitman rejects emergency injunction filed on behalf of immigrant families denied birth certificates for their American-born children because Texas health officials refuse to accept forms of foreign identification.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Austin denied an emergency injunction on behalf of immigrant families who were denied birth certificates for United States-born children.

headline.main: Texas: No Quick Ruling in Quest for Birth Certificates
headline.print_headline: Texas: No Quick Ruling in Quest for Birth Certificates

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Texas Department of State Health Services
